name: Report to PowerPoint
description: Export a Report to a PowerPoint pptx file
introductoryText:
## Export a Report to PowerPoint
### Grab screenshots (PNG) per Report tab / page and create a PPTX file with 1 tab/image per slide.

### Use it in combination with the Project metadata block to obtain the desired Report tabs URLs
![PDF Reader](data:image/png;base64,)


### Requires the installation of Chromedriver on your machine. Download it from [here](https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads).

options.name: urlField
options.title: Report Tabs URL field
options.description: The field containing the Report tabs URLs to screenshot. Use the Project Metadata block to obtain Reports Tab URLs.

options.name: folderPath
options.title: Output folder
options.description: The folder path where to save the png screenshot images and the pptx file

options.name: chromeDriver
options.title: Chromedriver executable
options.description: Path to the ChromeDriver executable file, e.g C:\Users\Freddie\chromedriver.exe

options.name: sleepSeconds
options.title: Page load delay
options.description: Wait the specified seconds before grabbing the screenshot to allow the page to load fully.

options.name: pptxFileName
options.title: PPTX file name
options.description: Optional file name, if empty output.pptx will be used.

options.name: keepScreenshots
options.title: Keep screenshots
options.description: Whether to keep the screenshots png files at the end of the execution or delete them.
